meta.title: Valaskar — Clean Crypto Infrastructure
meta.description: A decentralized virtual world of 10,000 independent lands, powered by blockchain. Built around a flagship AAA survival game.

about.title: What is Valaskar?
about.p1: Valaskar is a decentralized, blockchain-based virtual world defined by a fixed set of 10,000 independent lands, each owned by a Valaskar Passport (NFT) holder. Each land is operated by its owner and can host gameplay and social interaction for players, with a maximum of 128 concurrent players per land.
about.p2: The ecosystem is built around a flagship, AAA 3D survival game inspired by Rust/DayZ-style post-apocalyptic PvP, built with Unreal Engine 5 as a standalone original title. It serves as the main entry point with frictionless onboarding — no crypto needed to start.
about.p3: Land owners retain full control over gameplay rules, content, and monetization models. Land ownership and control are enforced on the blockchain, making cryptographically verifiable ownership.

tokenomics.title: VALA Token Distribution
tokenomics.subtitle: Fixed supply. Non-inflationary. Hard cap enforced at contract level.
tokenomics.daoTreasuryDesc: Locked for 180 days from launch. Thereafter, governance-gated with proposed 10-year on-chain vesting. Reserved for in-game rewards, creator grants, tournaments, and ecosystem growth.
tokenomics.pioneerDesc: Split equally across all 10,000 Passport NFTs (75,000 VALA each). Linear vesting over 12 months from activation. Claim-only via smart contract.
tokenomics.teamDesc: Locked in a TeamVesting contract. 12-month cliff followed by 36-month linear release. Only designated team treasury can claim.
tokenomics.publicDesc: Sale tranche: 240M VALA. Liquidity/MM tranche: 120M VALA. Locked for 30 days. Movements executed only under DAO or guardian controls.

passport.title: Valaskar Passports
passport.subtitle: Your key to the Valaskar world — own, govern, earn
passport.description: Valaskar Passports is a limited NFT collection of 10,000 items (ERC-721), which acts as the main digital passport in Valaskar, provides on-chain proof of ownership of a game land, and simultaneously functions as the DAO governance system.

governance.title: DAO Governance
governance.subtitle: On-chain governance by Passport holders. 1 NFT = 1 Vote.
governance.standardDesc: Quorum: 5% of snapshot supply, minimum 100 votes (FOR + ABSTAIN).
governance.criticalDesc: Quorum: max(5% of supply, 300), with at least 300 FOR votes required.
governance.guardianDesc: 3-of-5 team multisig can veto proposals. Guardian-change proposals are non-vetoable by design.

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: The protocol is already live. Roadmap is indicative and may change based on DAO decisions.
roadmap.phase2Desc: Third-party audit, public token sale (IDO) and initial liquidity program
roadmap.phase3Desc: Core game design, VALA economy design
roadmap.phase4Desc: VALA BRIDGE / L2 HUB design and deployment (DAO-approved)
roadmap.phase5Desc: Marketplace MVP, VALA Wallet, governance ops UI and monitoring
roadmap.phase6Desc: Creator tools MVP, official demo version and game trailers
roadmap.phase7Desc: Alpha and Beta versions of Valaskar on PC

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Valaskar is a decentralized, blockchain-based virtual world consisting of 10,000 independent lands. Each land is owned by a Valaskar Passport (NFT) holder and can host gameplay for up to 128 concurrent players. The ecosystem is built around a flagship AAA 3D survival game inspired by Rust and DayZ.
faq.a2: A Valaskar Passport is an ERC-721 NFT from a limited collection of 10,000 items. Each Passport represents one specific land on the 100×100 grid, grants on-chain administrative control to its holder, and provides 1 governance vote in the DAO. Each Passport also earns 75,000 VALA through Pioneer Rewards vesting.
faq.a3: VALA is the native ERC-20 token with a fixed, non-inflationary supply of 3 billion. It serves as the in-game currency and is used for protocol-wide payments, fees, land entry, crafting, marketplace transactions, and incentives. VALA does not grant governance votes — only Passport NFTs do.
faq.a4: Valaskar is governed by a DAO of Passport holders. Each NFT grants 1 vote. Proposals require backing by 25+ Passports, followed by a 4-hour delay, 2-day voting period, and 24-hour timelock before execution. All governance is enforced on-chain via smart contracts.
faq.q5: Do I need crypto to play?
faq.a5: No. The game is designed with frictionless onboarding — no crypto is needed to start playing. VALA is used for in-game economy, but the entry point is free. Owning a Passport NFT is only required if you want to own and operate a land.
faq.a6: Land owners have full control over content, rules, and gameplay mechanics within their land. This includes tuning progression, resource/loot rates, PvP/PvE rules, spawn logic, difficulty, monetization, and 200+ adjustable parameters. They can create custom game modes and publish their land as a standalone product.
faq.a7: Yes. Core smart contracts are live on Ethereum mainnet, including VALA (ERC-20), Valaskar Passport (ERC-721), Governor, Timelock, Pioneer Vesting, and Team Vesting. The game itself is still under development.
faq.a8: The Guardian is a 3-of-5 team multisig that acts as an early-stage safety mechanism. It can veto governance proposals (except those that replace the Guardian itself) and manage certain NFT sale controls. It cannot bypass timelocks, upgrade contracts, or transfer funds to arbitrary addresses.

products.title: Platform Components
products.subtitle: A modular product suite centered around a flagship AAA 3D game
products.valaWorldDesc: Flagship survival 3D game set in a post-apocalyptic world with hardcore PvP gameplay inspired by Rust and DayZ, built around scavenging, crafting, base-building, clan warfare, and territory control.
products.valaStudioDesc: Official creator software used to configure and operate lands and to create 3D assets. Build land content and items, distribute and trade across the ecosystem via the Marketplace.
products.valaTokenDesc: The native ERC-20 token used across the Valaskar ecosystem. Serves as the in-game currency and as the main token for protocol-wide payments, fees, and incentives.
products.passportDesc: A protocol-issued ERC-721 collection of 10,000 NFTs. Each Passport represents one specific land and grants on-chain administrative control to its holder.
products.walletDesc: A browser-based wallet extension for managing the VALA ecosystem token and signing transactions. Optional for players, required for Passport holders.
products.bridgeDesc: Official bridge and execution layer for DAO-approved transfers from Ethereum to an Ethereum-compatible L2, enabling low-fee, high-throughput ecosystem operations.
